div.a: Governor Murphy: Schools to stay closed through May 15

span.p: Governor Phil Murphy said Thursday, April 16 schools throughout the state will remain closed at least through May 15 to stem the spread of the COVID-19 novel coronavirus.

div.p: To provide a supportive and engaging learning environment that empowers students to become lifelong learners and responsible citizens.

Bedminster Township Public School is a Pre-K-8 school located in Somerset County, New Jersey, with an enrollment of around 520, a staff ofover 60teachers and a full time Child Study Team. After graduation, our students attendBernards High School.
